name: My Dear Kitsune
description:
The everyday life of a human named Sakura, who wears a pair of cat ears to fit in with the animals and half-animals in a magical high school. Sakura is aware of the fact that she lives in a game, but she honestly doesn't care, and the only problem is making sure nothing ridiculous happens to break the forth wall!

*Screenshots are in black and white because they were taken in-game. Gameplay is in colour.*

This game is not for those who are scared easily.
